page.title: 20Coming to live in Fulford
page.content: Fulford Primary School has 240 pupils, my old school of Ulleskelf had 30. My house cost Â£60,000 even though we sold our old one for Â£50,000 which was the same size. This is because Fulford is a popular area to live in, being close to York Univesity, where a lot of people work, and the A64, a major road leading to the coast and large cities like Leeds. Fulford itself is a very attractive village. It started off near the River Ouse but has now spread rapidly over the surrounding area. Within its boundaries it contains two schools , Fulford C.E School for chidren aged 5-11 yrs and Fulford Comprehensive for children from 11-16 yrs. Parents, when interviewed, said that the schooling offered by Fulford Comprehensive was a major consideration in coming to live in Fulford.
